Text.val: 03.10.2011 JH SCR16775 Added update of v.Date with Date() for use in GB902
06.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
02.05.2011 SH SCR16387 Replaced BPH122 by GB902
20.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
16.06.2005 EE SCR#8496 changed serveral table to read only

SQL_STMT_U.val: select badp_id, badp_bank_admno, badp_exchgrate, badp_bank_currency, badp_amountacccurr, ADMN_CURRENCY, ADMN_ADMNO_RATES from :1/badp, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = BADP_BANK_ADMNO and badp_unallocated = 'Y' and badp_bank_currency <> ADMN_CURRENCY and badp_exchgrate > 0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
